title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 4.4 - Pre-hearing conference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 4.4 - Pre-hearing conference

State Regulations
(a) A
presiding officer may convene a pre-hearing conference to formulate or simplify
issues; arrange for the exchange of testimony and exhibits; limit the number of
witnesses; set schedules; or otherwise expedite the orderly conduct of the
proceeding. (b) Facts disclosed in
pre-hearing conferences shall be privileged. Except by agreement, they may not
be used against participating parties unless proven by independent
evidence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
